View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.db2;
2   
3   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
4   
5   public abstract class ConcreteDb2SuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
6   
7       public ConcreteDb2SuiteIT() {
8           this.config();
9       }
10      
11      public void config() {
12        
13          this.jdbcURL = "jdbc:db2://jsql-db2:50000/testdb";
14          this.jdbcUser = "db2inst1";
15          this.jdbcPass = "test";
16          this.jsqlDatabaseName = "DB2INST1";
17          this.jsqlTableName = "STUDENT";
18          this.jsqlColumnName = "STUDENT_ID";
19          
20          this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName = "schemaname";
21          this.jdbcColumnForTableName = "name";
22          this.jdbcColumnForColumnName = "name";
23          
24          this.jdbcQueryForDatabaseNames = "select trim("+ this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName +") "+ this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName +" from syscat.schemata";
25          this.jdbcQueryForTableNames = "select "+ this.jdbcColumnForTableName +" from sysibm.systables where creator = '"+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"'";
26          this.jdbcQueryForColumnNames = "select "+ this.jdbcColumnForColumnName + " from sysibm.syscolumns where coltype != 'BLOB' and tbcreator = '"+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"' and tbname = '"+ this.jsqlTableName +"'";
27          this.jdbcQueryForValues = "SELECT "+ this.jsqlColumnName +" FROM "+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"."+ this.jsqlTableName;
28      }
29  }
